================================================CODE CHUNK================================================
### Tender for Absorbent Glass Mat (AGM) Batteries

**Government Tender Number:** PW__HN-446-81394

**Title:** Absorbent Glass Mat (AGM) Batteries (2V, 6V, 12V)

**Amended Solicitation Number:** E60HN-220859/A

### Tender Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada ([TPSGC-PWGSC](https://www.canada.ca/fr/travaux-publics.htm)) announces a competitive Request for Proposal (RFP) for a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) contract for the supply of Absorbent Glass Mat (AGM) Batteries for Marine Aids to Navigation and Telecommunications. This tender is in accordance with the Centralized Tendering System.

**Description**
---------------

We are seeking a qualified supplier to establish a standing offer contract for the supply of AGM batteries, as and when required, for a period of 31/12/2022. The contract is subject to Canada's requirements and compliance with trade agreements.

**Tender Requirements**
-----------------------

*   Delivery on a purchase-order-as-needed basis
*   Compliance with Comprehensive Trade Agreements (including but not limited to CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, and CFTA)
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
------------------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on price, as indicated in the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP).

**Tender Submission**
--------------------

Bids must be submitted in electronic format on the CanadaBUsy platform by [14:00 (ET) on 2022-11-04](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/procurement-project/E60HN-220859-A).

**Inquiries**
--------------

For any clarification or additional information regarding the tender, please contact:

Quiterie Garcia Lozano
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Gatineau, QC

Email: [quiterie.garcialozano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:quiterie.garcialozano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 296-2431
